text: bazar renga neinun an hong chôi ngei murdi khom an rusûk masa7:4: bazar renga neinun an hong chôi ngei murdi khom an rusûk masa nônchu sâk ngâi mak ngei; aninônchu i-ih neinuna khom bazar renga an honga tui an inbuol masa nônchu. nônchu sâk ngâi mak ngei. Male balam adang tamtak an man ngei hah an sûr mindet tit khom aom sa; ma ngei hah kilâtngei, bêlngei, sumsen khuriâingei, male jâlmunngei7:4: Male jâlmunngei ti hih miziek senkhat ngei chu dôn mak ngei. rusûk min sâi rang ti ngei ha ani.)
